import React, { Component } from 'react'; import { Layout, Navigation, Content } from 'react-mdl'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import AdidasShop from './images/AdidasShop.jpeg'; import ADimage from './images/ADimage.png'; import SearchIcon from './images/SearchIcon.png'; import IdeaIcon from './images/IdeaIcon.png'; import ValidationIcon from './images/ValidateIcon.png'; import ProtoIcon from './images/ProtoIcon.png'; import ADmockup from './images/ADmockup.jpg'; import AdidasAll from './images/AdidasAll.jpg'; import ADicon from './images/ADicon.png'; import ReactFullpage from "@fullpage/react-fullpage"; import TryIcon from './images/TryIcon.png'; import InfoIcon from './images/InfoIcon.png'; import BuyIcon from './images/BuyIcon.png'; class Resume extends Component { render() { return ( { return (

Previous

Projects

Next

"The IoT shop of the future"

During a 36h hackathon, the team NED team developed Adidas Shop, an IoT solution that intends to changes Adidas customer experience at their shops. The solution aims to let the costumers have a first try of the product, access to the products information and speed up the purchase process. With Adidas Shop, your customers have a new shopping experience and get the products they need without any worries!

Adidas Shop is a brand-new IoT shop that provides you with the best experience. With this new customer service, you can browse items information quickly, try them, and buy the ones you like just going out of the store. These are the central features that Adidas Shop brings:

Information

All the info about the product

Try it

Try it before buying it

Purchase

Skip doing the queue to pay

Smart Bag

Our Smart Bag is a specially designed box which can be adjusted according to the size of items and delivered directly to your door. Just have our frame installed on your wall and you will be able to enjoy this wonderful service - pick up the bag right in front of your home! Book the installation now and our Posti man will get everything done for you!

Returns

Don't like the item? Don't worry, we will solve the problem for you. With our app and smart bag, you can simply return the item back with one click and just leave it on the wall. Our Posti man will then get it and handle everything for you! This is our contribution to a more sustainable environment.

Process

The project intended to teach the overall process and practices of user-centred design of digital products and services. Therefore, we needed to start designing them from scratch going through all the stages of the procedure. During this process, these are the following tools that were used by the team.

Problem

Research

Semi-structured interviews

Ideation

6-5-3 Brainwriting

Ruber Ducking

Validation

7 dots validation method

Reviewing + Story board

Prototype

Sketch

Physical Models
